message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I believe will be highly valuable to you. Given its potential, I'm initially offering it at $1,400,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $1,200,000 is significantly below what I'm willing to accept.  This product offers exceptional value, and I'm confident it will bring you a substantial return on your investment.  How about we meet in the middle at $1,350,000?

I understand your perspective, Alice, but $1,350,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to compromise, but I can only go up to $1,300,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
